mapper.select: SELECT FLOOR((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy') - TO_CHAR(birth, 'yyyy')) / 10) * 10 AS age_group, MAX(CASE WHEN chart_age.age_range = FLOOR((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy') - TO_CHAR(birth, 'yyyy')) / 10) * 10 THEN chart_age.age_text END) AS age_text, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ling_member LEFT JOIN chart_age ON FLOOR((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy') - TO_CHAR(birth, 'yyyy')) / 10) * 10 = chart_age.age_range GROUP BY FLOOR((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy') - TO_CHAR(birth, 'yyyy')) / 10) * 10 ORDER BY age_group

SELECT pr.period_text, pr.period_range, COUNT(*) AS count FROM (select trunc(to_char(sysdate - create_date), -2) as period , case when trunc(to_char(sysdate - create_date), -2) >= 500 then 500 else trunc(to_char(sysdate - create_date), -2) end period_range from couple ) c JOIN period_range pr ON pr.period_range = c.period_range GROUP BY pr.period_text, pr.period_range ORDER BY period_range
